languages.text: {n}Дознаватель встречается с вами взглядом и улыбается — вкупе с выражением его ледяных глаз эта улыбка выглядит жутко.{/n} "Неужели ты на самом деле надеешься получить ответ на этот вопрос?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель встречается с вами взглядом, от которого кровь в ваших жилах заметно холодеет. Хейнрикс улыбается, и вкупе с выражением его ледяных глаз эта улыбка выглядит жутко.{/n} "Неужели ты на самом деле надеешься получить ответ на этот вопрос?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель встречается с вами взглядом и улыбается — вкупе с выражением его ледяных глаз эта улыбка выглядит жутко.{/n} "Неужели ты на самом деле надеешься получить ответ на этот вопрос?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator meets your gaze and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator meets your gaze and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator meets your gaze and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}这位审讯官看着你的双眼，露出了微笑，但他冰冷的眼神却让他的笑容看起来很令人不安。{/n}“你并不真的指望我会回答这样的问题，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位审讯官看着你的双眼，露出了微笑，但他冰冷的眼神却让他的笑容看起来很令人不安。{/n}“你并不真的指望我会回答这样的问题，是吧？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"

languages.text: {n}El interrogador te devuelve la mirada y sonríe... pero, con la expresión de sus ojos helados, el efecto que produce es inquietante.{/n} «No pretenderá de verdad que responda a esa pregunta, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador te devuelve la mirada y sonríe... pero, con la expresión de sus ojos helados, el efecto que produce es inquietante.{/n} «No pretenderá de verdad que responda a esa pregunta, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターはあなたの視線に微笑みを返した。 しかしその氷のように冷たい表情のために、むしろ不安な気持ちを抱かせる。{/n}「その質問に答えろというのは、難しい話だと思わないかね？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターはあなたの視線に微笑みを返した。 しかしその氷のように冷たい表情のために、むしろ不安な気持ちを抱かせる。{/n}「その質問に答えろというのは、難しい話だと思わないかね？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator erwidert deinen Blick und lächelt — doch der Ausdruck in seinen eiskalten Augen lässt dieses Lächeln eher beunruhigend wirken.{/n} "Ihr erwartet doch nicht ernsthaft, dass ich diese Frage beantworte?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator erwidert deinen Blick und lächelt — doch der Ausdruck in seinen eiskalten Augen lässt dieses Lächeln eher beunruhigend wirken.{/n} "Ihr erwartet doch nicht ernsthaft, dass ich diese Frage beantworte?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur vous rend votre regard, mais ses yeux, froids comme la glace, forment un étrange contraste avec le sourire qu'il vous adresse.{/n} « Vous ne vous attendez quand même pas à ce que je réponde à cette question, si ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur vous rend votre regard, mais ses yeux, froids comme la glace, forment un étrange contraste avec le sourire qu'il vous adresse.{/n} « Vous ne vous attendez quand même pas à ce que je réponde à cette question, si ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu sana bakıp gülümsese de donuk bakışlı mizacı yüzünden gülümsemesi sinirlerini bozuyor.{/n} "Bu soruyu cevaplamamı beklemiyorsun herhâlde, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator returns your look and smiles — but thanks to the expression in his ice-cold eyes, the effect is rather unnerving.{/n} "You can't really be expecting me to answer that question, can you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu sana bakıp gülümsüyor ama donuk bakışlı mizacı sağ olsun, bu gülümseme sinirlerini bozuyor.{/n} "Bu soruyu cevaplamamı beklemiyorsun herhâlde, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
